about_the_game:
Seals of Madness is a first-person psychological horror experience, inspired by the cosmic horrors of H. P. Lovecraft, where reality bends and every step pulls you deeper into a realm of twisted visions and creeping dread.

The Story

After a violent car accident caused by a mysterious vision of a young girl in the forest, you stumble upon an old, decrepit house. Drawn by the girl who seems to be asking for help, you enter the basement, only to find yourself trapped in its dark, decaying depths.

The air is thick with tension, and the deeper you go, the more reality begins to unravel.

What was once a search for escape quickly becomes something far more unsettling. You soon realize that the basement holds secrets older than time itself.

As you explore, the walls seem to close in, and the lines between what’s real and what’s imagined blur. Is it the trauma of the accident playing tricks on your mind, or is something far more sinister at play? All you know is that you need to escape… or at least, you think you do.

Key Features:

  • Atmospheric Horror: Immerse yourself in a dark, decaying environment where every shadow hides a threat. The game builds tension through its oppressive atmosphere, pulling you deeper into the unknown.

  • Mind-Bending Puzzles: Solve challenging puzzles that intertwine with the environment, revealing unsettling truths as you progress. The answers may lead to escape—or to something much darker.

  • Psychological Tension: As the game unfolds, your mind becomes as much a battleground as the environment. Subtle hallucinations, strange sounds, and unnerving encounters will have you questioning your own perception of reality.

  • Exploration and Discovery: Search every corner of the decrepit basement for clues, but be cautious—each step forward may uncover something you weren’t prepared to find.

  • An Unsettling Mystery: What starts as a simple escape grows more complex as new layers of mystery unravel. You might discover that some doors are better left closed.

Confront the Madness Beyond

In Seals of Madness, nothing is as it seems. The deeper you venture, the more the game warps your perception. What starts as a desperate struggle to survive soon becomes a descent into a nightmarish reality where escape may not be your only option.

Can you hold onto your sanity long enough to find the way out? Or will you lose yourself to the madness that lurks in the shadows?

short_description: After a car accident, you find yourself trapped in a dark, decaying basement, haunted by visions of a mysterious little girl and ancient entities. As you delve deeper into the twisted surroundings, you uncover terrifying secrets that threaten your sanity.
